Text: no official SHA1 hash available on this one - makes it hard to know if it's got any "extras" (viruses, spyware, etc...)
Full name of torrent - Microsoft.SQL.Server.2008.R2.DataCenter.Edition.x86.and.x64-ZWTiSO. So, it has ??? team keygen or not?

well am sure its fake... guess why...

Just ignore khurambz, he doesn't know what he's talking about. I've used this exact release. It is the data center edition and it includes both x86 and x64 software on the disc. It installs fine and even includes what appears to be a working license code.

Just ignore khurambz, he doesn't know what he's talking about. I've used this exact release. It is the data center edition and it includes both x86 and x64 software on the disc. It installs fine and even includes what appears to be a working license code which is automatcally entered for you during installation.
After downloading I got number of zip files named ZMSSR2DC.RAR. After extracting, an ISO file is obtained. Please suggest where is setup.exe or how to install. I'm new to sql server R2
How to install it
I got ISO files after extracting all zipped rar files. Where is setup.exe or Tell me how to install it

munishk: an ISO is a disc image. You can burn it using a good burning program (I use cdburnerxp. it's free =] ). You can also use a program such as Winrar and...unzip the ISO, for lack of a better word.

You can also use  MagicISO (MagicDisc) to mount the ISO as a virtual disc. If that makes no sense to you, I'd suggest just using CDburnerXP and burning the ISO. =]

There is an 32 Bit version of this great upload for those who are confused.
Look here:
http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms143506.aspx

Thank You Uploader!

I'm installing and everything looks good.

Thanks!

Nobody seems to like to upload SQL SERVER releases. So hard to find a simple 2008 Enterprise version!

If you already have another SQL Server 2008 R2 download e.g. Standard - you can re-run that setup, go into the maintenance option and choose edition upgrade - Use the serial below and voila! 100% Data centre :-)

DDT3B-8W62X-P9JD6-8MX7M-HWK38

I've it installed just fine (default instance) on a 64 bit Win 7 laptop. The only problem I'm encountering is logging into the database engine. I previously installed a version of SQL EXPRESS and thought I had completely uninstalled it, but that was the first option to log in when I went to the SSMS.  It had ZEUS/SQLEXPRESS as the default login.  I changed it to the default instance ZEUS/MSSSQLSERVER, but still no luck.  Also, I was unsure how to configure all the service accts when I installed it so I set them all to something/NTWRK.  Perhaps this is the problem? Can someone be so kind as to help me out on this? TIA!

munishk, if you're able to obtain an iso file then all you need to do is mount it on VirtualCloneDrive and the setup.exe should just pop up. Hit the internets for the free program.
